SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.math.physics

Class BoundingBox

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.physics.BoundingBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
Solid
public class BoundingBox extends Object implements Solid
An un-rotatable box in 3D space. Bounding boxes are used for rough comparison between solids.

      @Nonnull public Double3[] getCorners()

      public int getNumCorners()

    • getBoundingBox

      @Nonnull public BoundingBox getBoundingBox()
      Returns the bounding box of this solid. Since this is already a bounding box and bounding boxes are immutable, this method simply returns a reference to the bounding box itself.
      Specified by:
      getBoundingBox in interface Solid
      Returns:
      this
